thread.title: Bachelorette's Robby Hayes Signs Modeling Deal: This Is a 'Big Step in the Right Direction'
thread.title_full: Bachelorette's Robby Hayes Signs Modeling Deal: This Is a 'Big Step in the Right Direction'

title: Bachelorette's Robby Hayes Signs Modeling Deal: This Is a 'Big Step in the Right Direction'
text:
Bachelorette's Robby Hayes Signs Modeling Deal: This Is a 'Big Step in the Right Direction' February 11, 2017 @ 2:37 PM By Nicholas Hautman Robby Hayes attends The Bachelor Charity Premiere Party in Los Angeles, California (January 2, 2017). Credit: Rodin Eckenroth/WireImage 
Bachelor Nation's next top model! Robby Hayes has signed a modeling deal with Wilhelmina Denver, the Bachelorette season 12 runner-up confirms to Us Weekly . PHOTOS: 10 Times 'The Bachelor' Made Our Heads Explode! 
"I've never been with a major agency such as Wilhelmina Denver," Hayes, 28, tells Us . "I've been signed with a couple smaller local agencies in my past, but this will be a big step in the right direction for me." 
The hunky model, who vied for JoJo Fletcher 's heart on the ABC dating show last year, will get product endorsements and hosting gigs through the modeling agency, according to TMZ , which was first to report the news. PHOTOS: The Most Ridiculous ‘Bachelor’ and ‘Bachelorette’ Job Titles Ever 
"The entire industry in Denver excites me," Hayes tells Us . "It's grown so much in recent years and the opportunity of not only great Colorado projects but national projects as well will be greatly beneficial for both Wilhelmina and my career moving forward." You May Also Like
